Perceptor:

"How did Chameleon ticked you off, Bullet?" asked Perceptor 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Bullet tried to think back to the fight. He could see Chameleon 
flick the alarm with his toung and he remembered backhanding the bot. 
Everything that happened after that was a red blurr to the bot.
> 
> "Chameleon ticked me off sir." The bullbot made no excuses for his 
actions, he didn't admit or deny that it had happened. He just knew 
that if the bot sitting in front of him had accused him then it must 
be true. Bullet knew that he'd have to answer the claims against him 
and he knew that he'd have to take whatever punishment that Perceptor 
would give him.
> 
> 
> Perceptor::
> 
> "Now Bullet, I want to know why did you attacked Chameleon?"
> said Perceptor
